text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
――Opera O-san arrives on the scene with perfect timing.
Ahh~, sho beautiful... Her lovely locks are glistening in the morning sun... Hough, so good!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ohh, no, no, no! Doto-san actually got here an hour earlier! But she fell over, ripped her clothes and went to go change... Oh, but of course Top Road-san has it all figured out!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Uwwaagh, could it be... They're standing on either side of Doto so they can catch her if she falls!? THE FEELS! HNNNGH, THEY'RE SO NICE TO HERRRRR!!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Oh... Ohh... I'm gonna die of a moe overdose...
But the day's only just getting started! Huehue, huehuehuehuehue! Let's gooooooo~♪

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Wow, look at this crowd!
It looks like we'll have to wait an hour or two to get on any rides...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Just like I thought...
We're going to spend the whole day waiting in line.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
HAA-HAHAHA! Come now, you're in the land of fairy tales!
And I, the Overlord, have graced this glittering Christmas town with my presence!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Now come, shower me with admiration to your heart's content!
Feel free to capture all the portraits you want!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Oh, that must mean she wants some pictures to remember the trip. Does that sound good to you, Ayabe-san?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...I think I'd rather sit down somewhere.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Oh, you want to take a break? How about we take it easy and eat some popcorn? Doto-chan, do you... Oh, was there anything you wanted to do?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
W-w-w-w-well... E-ear accessories...!
I want to wear matching ear accessories!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Accessories...?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
L-look, over there! They're matching with their friends~!
I- I think it'd be nice if we matched too...!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, that sounds great!
Let's go get them so we can match! How about we take a picture with them on?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Splendid! When in Rome, revel as the Romans do!
Let us enjoy the festivities in a manner befitting Prince Orlofsky!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Just for today.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
A-are you sure!?
I- I'm so happyyy~~~!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(BGWAAAAAA! Wh-what the... What a perfect shot!
Thankyousomuchthankyousomuch!)

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Opera O, don't you think that's a little much?
What is that outfit supposed to be?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
What, is it not obvious?
I call it "The Overlord's Respite: Come, My Rivales, Let Us Embrace This World, and Indulge in Revelry!"

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Revelry... Oh! So the reason you were looking at those wine glasses for so long was because they reminded you of a party?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Does that not seem strange to you?
What could you possibly use wine glasses for at a theme park?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Why, to dress the set for our revelry photos, of course.
Oh, look at that meat! It's the splitting image of a scepter! 
A perfect prop for our set!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Hah... Hah... It's secret event after secret event! My mental camera's taking snapshots like crazy! Digitan's gonna save it all straight to the kokoro!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Oh, oh, look! It's Indeere-chan!
Wahhh~ It's so cuteeee! I sure want a picture with it~

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Then let's take one!
Oh, Ayabe-san, do you want to join in?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
!
...Why are you dragging me along?...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Doto-chan's face got all stiff at the idea of taking a picture by herself. So I just thought it'd be better if someone took the picture with her...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
T-that's right... If I'm by myself, I get really self-conscious...
But, um, if it's too much trouble, then...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...It's fine. I understand. You're... you're not causing me any trouble.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ayabe-san, do you think you can scooch a little closer to Indeera-chan? ――Okay, here we go! Say cheese!

text_block_list.name: The Two
text_block_list.text:
Eheheh~
Fluffy...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Bwaahhh...
Thank you so much for this pwecious gift!
